name: Code Executed Via Office Add-in XLL File
description:
Adversaries may abuse Microsoft Office add-ins to obtain persistence on a compromised system.
Office add-ins can be used to add functionality to Office programs
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*new\-object\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-ComObject\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*.application* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*.RegisterXLL*)`
